mapper.sql: id, name, spu_id, count, create_time, update_time, merchant_id, create_user_name, create_user_id
mapper.select: select cgs.id, cgs.name, cgs.spu_id, cgs.count, cgs.create_time, cgs.update_time from contact_group_stock cgs LEFT JOIN contact_group_sku_stock cgss ON cgss.contact_group_stock_id = cgs.id LEFT JOIN contact_group_pu_stock cgps ON cgps.contact_group_sku_id = cgss.id where cgps.pu_id = #{puId}
